param.name: guidService
param.para: The service identifier (SID) of the service. For a list of service identifiers, see Service Interfaces.

param.name: riid
param.para: The interface identifier (IID) of the interface being requested.

param.name: ppvObject
param.para: Receives the interface pointer. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: The object does not support the service.

summary.para: Queries an object for a specified service interface.

remarks.para: A service is an interface that is exposed by one object but might be implemented by another object. The method is equivalent to QueryInterface, with the following difference: when QueryInterface retrieves a pointer to an interface, it is guaranteed that you can query the returned interface and get back the original interface. The GetService method does not make this guarantee, because the retrieved interface might be implemented by a separate object.
The function is a helper function that queries an object for IMFGetService and calls the method.
